physical_examinations.relevant_findings: 38-year-old male with severe nasal airway problems due to previous septal surgery. On postoperative day 4, widespread small aphthous pustular lesions (2 to 5 mm) with central ulceration were observed.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Lesions regressed and disappeared within five days without scarring.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Postoperative examination showed satisfactory external appearance and a good nasal airway post-surgery.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: No other complications were observed in follow-up.
